last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 60
last_episode_to_air.overview: Maritza's livestream turns into chaos when Avril and Germen's scheming comes to light. Teresa and Nibardo reunite. Salvador makes a choice.

name: The Influencer
overview: After a social media stunt goes wrong, an influencer is forced to rebuild her reputation while navigating a cutthroat online scene.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Aspiring influencer Maritza is betrayed and her online reputation is ruined. Salvador works to save his father's legacy but has enemies in every corner.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Salvador helps Maritza prove her innocence. Kike enlists Salvador's girlfriend Avril to help them in their business. Maritza confronts her fears.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Maritza creates content for Salvador's pizzieria but a new face puts her job at risk. Kamila tells Kike about the social campaign against Sarabia.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Salvador confronts his mother about the smear campaign against Sarabia. Having been fired by Avril, Maritza accepts an offer she never expected.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Salvador and Avril make amends. Aida joins forces with Kamila to destroy Maritza. Maritza accepts Avril's help going against Salvador's advice.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Kamila's new video leaves Maritza in hot water. Salvador confronts Kamila about her fraudulent content. Kike's new relationship proves divisive.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Avril makes a move that threatens her relationship with Salvador. Maritza makes a startling revelation on a livestream that piques Avril's suspicions.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Germen and Kamila plan a smear campaign against Maritza that involves her family. Maritza's confidence takes a blow from online haters.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Maritza finds her family infiltrated by Germen. Salvador demands an exclusive contract with Maritza. Nacho's presence saves a disastrous dinner.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Teresa's future is threatened by her past with Aldo. Salvador discovers Avril's betrayal. Maritza gains new - and powerful - friends.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Maritza's latest viral video leaves a massive impact. Salvador sets hard boundaries with Avril. Maritza's twin brothers plan their online takeover.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The twins' actions lead to severe consequences. Avril's plan of attack against Salvador is set in motion. Maritza receives an enticing opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Maritza says farewell to Salvador and makes moves to grow her career - which her enemies work to sabotage. Yesenia manipulates Nibardo.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: After the twins' video tanks Maritza's online profile, she's forced to return home. Salvador seeks Laura's help when his pizzeria is threatened.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Maritza avoids prison but, the price for freedom is costly. Avril's life takes a complete turn when her father's arrest threatens her lifestyle.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Laura's working relationship with Salvador takes a hit. Avril attempts to make amends. Maritza and Salvador's relationship takes a turn.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Maritza and Salvador's relationship progresses but Avril has more schemes up her sleeve. Peluche struggles to find his footing in a new city.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A new face isolates Maritza. Peluche ventures into the world of social media. Salvador and Maritza takes the new step in their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Avril's plan to destroy Maritza continues as the influencer plans her wedding to Salvador.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Avril's plan kicks into gear, leaving Maritza devastated. Determined to save what he has left, Salvador focuses on helping Teresa.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Maritza and Salvador conduct their own investigations into who leaked her private phone calls, but their enemies weave a tangled web of lies.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Salvador finds the hacker responsible for Maritza's tapped phone calls but the influencer takes the evidence into her own hands.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Maritza moves forward with her lawsuit against Teresa which puts Salvador in a difficult position. Avril hides her involvement in Maritza's wiretapping.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: A court hearing analyzing Maritza's leaked audio leaves her in a bad light. Chaos erupts at Maritza's charity event after misinformation spreads.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Maritza fights to keep her charity afloat. Nibardo makes a secret deal with Teresa. Avril and Kikes' relationship takes an abrupt turn.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: After buying the hotel, Nibardo lies to Maritza about his lender. As Maritza and Salvador sign a new deal, Avril is left with nothing to lose.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Avril's war against Maritza is threatened by Kike and Salvador's rocky friendship. New sponsors at Maritza's non-profit propose drastic changes.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: A new business opportunity brings Maritza and Salvador closer together just as Laura sets her sights on moving her relationship with Salvador forward.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Salvador warns Kike against trusting Avril. Nacho's hopes for a relationship with Maritza are dashed as Salvador confesses his feelings for Laura.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Maritza and Joaqu√≠n's new business plan fails to impress Salvador; Nibardo sets out to prove Maritza's audio files were manipulated.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Nibardo and Peluche try to find Teresa's accomplice. With Laura and Joaqu√≠n in their lives, the love between Salvador and Maritza appears to fade.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Avril's plans to regain control of Maritza Pizza gain steam with a new partner in crime. Salvador is shocked to meet his mother's new boyfriend.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Joaqu√≠n plays his last card to keep Maritza for himself. The pizzeria's expansion stalls due to Aldo's meddling. Peluche discovers Polo's new flame.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Avril and Joaqu√≠n sabotage Maritza and the pizzeria. Teresa sets out to recover the original audio of Maritza's phone calls to appease Nibardo.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Joaqu√≠n's growing interest in Maritza causes Salvador to doubt his intentions. Trying to reach influencer status, Castor makes a dangerous enemy.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: The future of Maritza Pizza hangs in the balance after serious crimes are lodged against its investors. A new proposal leaves Maritza surprised.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Castor's lies lead Polo back home for a confrontation. Maritza's final appearance at the pizzeria ends in her last night of freedom.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Maritza sees a familiar face in prison. Avril succeeds in reeling Kike in. Salvador questions Maritza's involvement in Joaqu√≠n's scheme.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: With Maritza in prison, Salvador removes her image from the pizzeria's publicity - leaving the spot wide open for another aspiring social media star.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Maritza gains permission to create content from prison. After Karla's debut as the new face of Maritza Pizza, Salvador and Kike face online responses.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Avril's lies end up turning into a reality. Castor is surprised by Nibardo's reaction to Polo's relationship. Maritza is hopeful of being free.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Seeing Karla take over as the public figure for the pizzeria deals Maritza the first of several blows. Salvador's relationship with Laura progresses.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: A surprise witness leads to Maritza's release from prison but causes confusion within Salvador. Castor's life hangs in the balance after an accident.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: With Peluche's help, Maritza sets her sights on a new business venture. When Maritza Pizza needs its new star the most, Karla is nowhere to be found.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Realizing Salvador still has feelings for Maritza, Laura makes a decision. Martha returns to the hotel intent on reigniting her affair with Nibardo.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Maritza's authenticity on social media brings back her joy for the job - but it doesn't sit well with Salvador or his business dealings.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Salvador begins losing control of his company after a new investor comes in. Maritza gains a surprise ace in her quest to prove her innocence.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Salvador makes moves to reclaim the Maritza Pizza brand from Maritza but she isn't letting it go without a fight.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: As Avril's mania grows, Germen endeavors to correct his past mistakes. Maritza and Salvador work out a new working deal at Maritza Pizza.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Threatened by Germen's recovered memory, Avril reintegrates herself at Maritza Pizza to stay closer to Salvador. Tensions brew around every corner.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Maritza stops Salvador from intruding on her love life. Germen returns to his old ways to Salvador's detriment. Nibardo and Teresa tie the knot.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: Maritza's new social campaign saves the pizzeria and Salvador from discrimination allegations. Teresa confesses a terrible secret to Salvador.

episodes.name: Episode 53
episodes.overview: Salvador is tormented by his treatment of Maritza but finds an opportunity to make it up to her. Teresa shares another devastating truth.

episodes.name: Episode 54
episodes.overview: Aldo reveals new information that threatens to destroy Salvador. A new opportunity might land Maritza in foreign waters.

episodes.name: Episode 55
episodes.overview: Maritza's dreams crumble when her past legal troubles get in the way. Salvador struggles with his new inheritance.

episodes.name: Episode 56
episodes.overview: Salvador's plan to woo Maritza is set in motion, but his competition isn't far behind. Maritza must make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Episode 57
episodes.overview: A strange video alerts everyone to Maritza's sudden retirement from social media. Kike and Mafe's friendship throws a wrench between her and Avril.

episodes.name: Episode 58
episodes.overview: The search for Maritza begins after a clue is found in the unlikeliest place. Avril's obsession with Salvador crosses into madness.

episodes.name: Episode 59
episodes.overview: Salvador grows close to Avril with the hopes of finding Maritza. When Germen disappears, Avril's secrets are threatened with discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 60
episodes.overview: Maritza's livestream turns into chaos when Avril and Germen's scheming comes to light. Teresa and Nibardo reunite. Salvador makes a choice.
